condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Human resources Capacities available for CP programme delivery

description.narrative: UNICEF Child protection programme in Sudan is designed, implemented and monitored by a high caliber of staff, consultants, Young UNV deployed in the main office in Khartoum and in 6 field offices and 5 sub-offices across Sudan. Twenty six staff members are currently onboard within the CP programme with only one vacant position and recruitment is ongoing. Diverse and changing needs in the country required a team of diverse backgrounds. 50% out of the 26 staff members are female. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
